summary: This is a brief email regarding a scheduling conflict for a detention hearing for Jeffrey Epstein, sent from an individual to the Chief of the Criminal Division at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. It indicates the need to reschedule a 10 a.m. Monday hearing.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the detention hearing mentioned in the email.

events.title: Scheduled Epstein Detention Hearing
events.description: A detention hearing for Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for 10 a.m. on a Monday, which based on the email date would be July 15, 2019. The email discusses a conflict and the need to reschedule.

keyFacts: An email dated July 12, 2019, discusses a scheduling conflict for a detention hearing for Jeffrey Epstein.
The hearing was originally scheduled for 10 a.m. on Monday, July 15, 2019.
The email is addressed to the Chief of the Criminal Division at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating high-level legal involvement.
The need to reschedule the hearing is implied.
